scene.name: intro
scene.line: We build every cask by hand, right here. It's tradition, but I like to think our application of hands and hammers to the oak gives our stuff a kind of ... life.
Well, that's what I like to think.
scene.option: Something to be said for that.

scene.name: craft
scene.line: `Craft`. Well, that's what you call it. Sure, we've grown over the years, but we still consider ourselves a craft distillery.

scene.name: coffins
scene.line: That's tradition, too, I suppose. And I'm sure it helps avert suspicion if a satellite catches us burying them upstairs ...
